instruction: Describe the emerging trends in web performance optimization.
output: Some of the key emerging trends in web performance optimization are the use of content delivery networks (CDNs), caching technologies and HTTP/2, modular content design approaches, optimizing images and minimizing redirects, as well as best practices in server performance, page load optimization, and web analytics. Additionally, more organizations are being proactive about performance monitoring, server infrastructure, and proactively labelling the content and files they create. This shift means that websites are becoming faster and more user-friendly.
